q: Under BSF, every secondary school in England was due to be rebuilt or refurbished over a 15-20-year period at an estimated cost of? 55 billion. Michael Gove said the programme had been beset by massive overspends, tragic delays, botched construction projects and needless bureaucracy . The decision is a further embarrassment for the Education Secretary who was forced to apologise last summer after he released a flawed list of school building projects facing the axe. When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined- even in my wildest dreams- that we would get as far, as fast as we have today.[...] But as Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, said Eric Schmidt in a letter to Google staff.
